item.title: [ 49] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>NEWS
https://videocardz.com/newz/nvidia-grants-rtx-5060-drivers-access-to-media-willing-to-publish-previews
Njudea tries faking reviews for the RTX 5060

>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE.
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases.
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped.
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Build_a_PC

>CASE (from $ to $$$)
mATX: Asus Prime AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini
ATX: Phanteks XT PRO (ULTRA), Montech AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lian Li Lancool 207, Antec C8, Antec Flux Pro
AVOID: NXZT, 'Silent' cases, fanless cases, Corsair 6500

>CPU
Budget: 9600X, 7600X, 7500f
Gaming: AMD X3D
Workstation: 9950X, 7950X
AVOID Shittel

>COOLER
AIO: Best Value: Thermalright Frozen Prism, Premium LCD: Lian Li Galahad II LCD
Double towers: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE, Noctua NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Scythe Fuma 3/TR AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
Avoid ASRock for Zen 5 due to a melting issue with a currently unknown cause that is happening more frequently on their boards.
Zen 4 is safe

>RAM
DDR4: 2x16GB 3200CL16. Budget, 2x8GB
DDR5: 2x16GB 6000CL30
Workstation/high end: consider 2x32GB

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: Silicon Power UD90
Mid range: SN770
Premium: SN850X
Flagship: Sabrent Rocket 5

>GPU
1080p: No VRAM: RTX 5060 and RTX 5060 TI 8GB, Fake Frames: RTX 5060 TI 16GB, Real Performance: RX 9060 XT
1440p: Fake Frames: RTX 5070 TI, Real Performance: RX 9070 XT, Budget: RX 9060 XT
4K: Fire Starter: RTX 5090, Scam Enjoyer: RTX 5080, Affordable: 9070 XT
Value For Money: AVOID Ngreedia cards
ALWAYS pair AMD GPUs with AMD CPUs for SAM https://imgur.com/a/6XSNJ9b

>PSU
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
https://pcmonitors.info/recommendations/

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>>/g/fwt

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid range: Arctic P12/P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

Previous: >>105295119

Original filename: Screenshot 2025-05-18 022932.png

>(05/17) Qwen releases WorldPM, 72B reward model: https://hf.co/Qwen/WorldPM-72B
>(05/15) Falcon-Edge: b1.58 1B and 3B models: https://falcon-lm.github.io/blog/falcon-edge
>(05/14) Ling-lite-1.5, 16.8B-A2.75B released: https://hf.co/inclusionAI/Ling-lite-1.5
>(05/12) #10544 llama/ggml: add LLM training support merged: https://github.com/ggml-org/llama.cpp/pull/10544
>(05/11) INTELLECT-2 released: https://hf.co/PrimeIntellect/INTELLECT-2

item.title: [472] games with interesting combat systems
item.description:
Tell me about games that have interesting and unique combat systems, even if they end up not fully sticking the landing.

Webm related is resonance of fate, an active time turn based jrpg in which positioning matters for destroying certain parts of enemies, crossing between team mates charges up special attacks, and there's a lot of running and gunning and you can even juggle enemies too.

item.title: [ 82] /tugão/ - Day of Reflection Edition
item.description:
So, today is the day all of Portugal becomes /tugão/, becomes /sp/. This is because today we are under a special kind of censorship and cannot talk about a determined kind of subject (at least in official media).

Fortunately, today will not be a boring day because it is the day the best league in the world finishes its 2024-25 season. And a very exciting end it will be! We still do not have a champion decided; both Sporting and Benfica, which have the same points, can win it. They will play against Vitoria SC and SC Braga, respectively. Sporting only needs to have the same points as Benfica to win the league. If not, Benfica wins it.

But wait, there is more. None of the important decisions have yet been made. We still do not know who will be relegated. Four teams are in danger: Estrela, AVS, Farense and Boavista. Estrela is in the best position: it just needs to do the same result as AVS and Farense. AVS will go to the playoff (to be played against Vizela) if it wins its match; if it draws, it will go to the playoff if Farense does not win; it will still go to the playoff if Farense loses and Boavista does not win. Farense will go to the playoff if it wins and AFS does not; or if it ties and AFS loses. Poor Boavista is in the toughest scenario, needing to win and wait AFS and Farense lose to reach the playoff (unlike the others, it cannot stay up automatically).

Vitoria SC and Santa Clara are also deciding who will go to the conference league. Vitoria just needs to do the same result as Santa Clara to get the spot.

There is also a decision for third place and direct qualification for Europa League, but for Braga to get it it would have to defeat Benfica by 7 goals while FC Porto loses.

So give our league a chance in its final day, /sp/, and please consider watching it next season. Also, stay for the /electionbowl/ to happen tomorrow. We can promise a shitshow there as well, with many memes too.

All games start at 18:00 (greatest allies timezone)

Original filename: Imagem100.jpg

item.title: [ 46] Biden interview released
item.description:
Remember when the White House blocked the release of audio from President Joe Biden’s interview with a special counsel about his handling of classified documents, arguing that Republicans in Congress only wanted the recordings “to chop them up” and use them for political purposes.?
Now you can listen to his slurred incoherent voice yourself, as he trails off into awkward pauses and gets lost in unrelated topics, unaware of the original question! Listen as he doesn't know when his son died, and as he fails to formulate basic sentences, forgetting what he just said and asks what he was talking about, before trailing off talking about train rides before forgetting yet again what he was talking about about! Hear his attorney ask if he needs a pudding break!
https://www.axios.com/2025/05/16/biden-hur-tape-special-counsel-audio
Amid long, uncomfortable pauses, Joe Biden struggled to recall when his son died, when he left office as vice president, what year Donald Trump was elected or why he had classified documents he shouldn't have had, according to audio Axios obtained of his October 2023 interviews with special counsel Robert Hur.

This is how that part of the interview is recounted in the transcript: Biden says, "OK, yeah. In 2017, Beau had passed and — this is personal — the genesis of the book and the title Promise Me, Dad, was a — I know you're all close with your sons and daughters, but Beau was like my right arm and Hunt was my left."

But here's what it sounded like in the quiet room where the dead air between Biden's pauses is emphasized by the tick-tock of the clock:
"Okay, yeah … "

Tick.
"... Beau had passed and …"
Tick. Tock. Tick. Tock. Tick.
"... this is personal …"
Tick. Tock. Tick. Tock. Tick.
"... the genesis … "
Tick.
"...of the book and the title Promise Me, Dad, was a …"
Tick. Tock. Tick.
"... I know you're all close with your sons and daughters, but Beau was .."
Tick. Tock.
"...like my right arm and Hunt was my left."

item.title: [ 40] Some Republicans Push to Put School Desegregation Officially in the Past
item.description:
https://www.nytimes.com/2025/05/16/us/louisiana-republicans-last-vestiges-school-desegregation.html
Republican leaders in Louisiana are pushing to end the last remnants of federally ordered school desegregation in their state, arguing that the era of racial exclusion is in the past and that the U.S. government has forced burdensome requirements on school districts long enough.

They may have found allies in the Trump administration, as it seeks to slash federal bureaucracy and roll back diversity efforts across the country.

It has been 71 years since the Supreme Court made racially segregated schools illegal in its landmark 1954 ruling, Brown v. Board of Education. Louisiana officials say that federal orders forcing school districts to comply with the decision are outdated and no longer needed, and that the country needs to move on.

Civil rights advocates see the effort as part of a broader attack on Black students and civil rights under the Trump administration, at a time when U.S. schools are only growing more segregated.

Nationally, more than 300 desegregation orders are estimated to still be on the books from the 1960s and 1970s, when school districts resistant to integration were put under the supervision of federal courts. In the decades since, many orders have gone dormant, with little federal enforcement.

item.title: [111] Dems seething over the GOP lowering taxes so the poor can afford vital heating safe devices
item.description:
https://www.nj.com/politics/2025/05/who-asked-for-this-the-assassin-lobby-trump-bill-ripped-over-sickening-gun-provision.html
Like legit shitting their pants. this is a reconciliation bill. All the fingerprinting, background checks and registry requirements would remain in effect. the only change would be the $200 tax stamp would become free. Why do the dems want to use taxes to prevent the poor from accessing hearing safe devices? or are the dems saying that background checks and a registry do nothing?
>“So like many of you, I can’t say that I’m shocked. I’m disgusted that Republicans would include in their ‘Screw Americans Bill,’ this provision. And I really want to ask: Who asked for this? Was it the assassin lobby? So let me get this straight ... Republicans are cutting health care on 13.7 million Americans, but making silencers cheaper? Make it make sense … cutting the tax to zero. What planet are you even on to propose such a provision?," he said during a House hearing.
>“And clearly this was endorsed by the entire Republican caucus. This is something that all of the members are backing.
wow, so I got what I voted for. based
>We’ve got one member who’s spoken on it, and he referred to a 1934 law. So let me get that right: That’s 91 years of existing law that you want to upend in a Republican bill on behalf of the assassin lobby,” he added.
weird how they cite how old the NFA is, but the 2nd amendment is over 240 years old and they think that is too old.
In most yuro countries it's common to have suppressors and suppressors are mandated for certain tasks. I really don't see why the dems want Americans to go deaf. even the Army is attempting to put a suppressor on every rifle in attempt to drive down the number of soldiers with hear loss issues

item.title: [241] SCP Foundation
item.description:
This is an issue with all paranormal fiction, but it's especially egregious with SCP. The Veil is unsustainable nonsense. The sheer amount of anomalous phenomena makes it logistically impossible to keep all this shit secret. I feel like all stories in this genre eventually have to lead to a Broken Masquerade, otherwise suspension of disbelief is fucked.

item.title: [115] Pokemon Pisces is a genuine masterpiece
item.description:
I'm having more fun with it than with most pokemon games, and i'm a true fan of the series that loved Scarlet and Violet despite it's bugs and graphical issues, Pisces is just everything good about pokemon cranked up to a max without all the shitty parts, plus it gets away with some lewder and more adult stuff that the official games could never be able to, I'm on gym 6 right now and depending on how the game continues from now on it may replace HGSS as my favorite pokemon game ever

Wish it was more popular because I want porn of the characters/fakemons, what did you think about it? i started playing on release, took a break for 4 months and picked it back up again last week and have been having a blast

item.title: [213] /jpg/ - Japan General
item.description:
Vending Machine Edition

ー How do I travel by public transportation? ー
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

ー What should I see in <place>? ー
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

ーJR Passー
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting May 2024
>7 day Pass: ¥50,000
>14 day Pass: ¥80,000
>21 day Pass: ¥100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

item.title: [ 52] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

Original filename: trv.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 76] Anybody from a third-world country ever (legally) travel to the US?
item.description:
Is it really as hard as it seems? My friend in Colombia is trying to visit the US but it seems unreasonably hard to get a tourist visa. Do they really require an in-person interview at the US embassy in Bogota? He doesn't live anywhere near Bogota, how is that reasonable to expect him to travel all the way to Bogota ? Is there any way around that or can he do the interview over the phone? He's just trying to get a tourist visa, not become an immigrant, so why make him pay for a flight and take extra days off work just for a tourist visa?

And how long does it actually take to get a tourist visa approved? How long in advance does he need to plan the trip?

Original filename: US-visa-1366x768-2187306852.jpg

>trail is now available to everyone, no permit needed

item.title: [305] QTDDTOT
item.description:
Questions That Don't Deserve Their Own Thread
>also known as /sqt/ (Stupid Questions Thread)

For your quick one-off questions that pertain to travel.

Long or convoluted questions should get their own thread.

Questions about popular destinations should be asked in any active thread about them.
